messages.subject: Re: 8 year old looking for "pen" pal
messages.msgSnippet: We ve gotten great responses and found people all over the country!  This is really fun! The writing is the means, not the end.  The end (for us) is fun,
messages.messageBody:
We've gotten great responses and found people all over the country! This is really fun!

The writing is the means, not the end. The "end" (for us) is fun, communication, exploring
different people and places, doing cool stuff with the computer. My son says it's fun
"because you can compare different places and environments, and send messages all over
the country".

I find this list thought provoking and challenging, and really appreciate the efforts of
those who post.

Suzanne

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "sstritzler" <suz@...> wrote:
>
> My 8 year old unschooled son Robert is looking for kids to e-mail. He says he's
interested
> in: "building with Legos (esp. Star Wars), learning about physics, playing basketball and
> soccer, and reading. We live on farm in Vermont with cows, sheep, a horse, chickens,
dogs
> and cats."
> Any takers, or ideas for finding interested kids?
>
> Thanks,
> Suzanne
>

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] 8 year old looking for "pen" pal
messages.msgSnippet: my 7 year old daughter is soooooo in to legos.  Esp star wars.  She is rather good and puts them together all by herself and makes Lego stop motion films and
messages.messageBody:
my 7 year old daughter is soooooo in to legos.  Esp star wars.  She is rather good and puts them together all by herself and makes Lego stop motion films and puts them on youtube.  We are in Sunny Fl.  If you would like to have them be pen pals email me off list :)
Meridith


--- On Wed, 2/18/09, carrollcroom916@... <carrollcroom916@...> wrote:

From: carrollcroom916@... <carrollcroom916@...>
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] 8 year old looking for "pen" pal
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Date: Wednesday, February 18, 2009, 4:52 PM







Oh Suzanne, how I wish I lived in Vermont.. your farm sounds so peaceful.. I will see what pen pals I may be able to round up for your little one. Huggs from SC.
Carroll

-----Original Message-----
From: sstritzler <suz@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@ yahoogroups. com
Sent: Mon, 16 Feb 2009 12:00 pm
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] 8 year old looking for "pen" pal

My 8 year old unschooled son Robert is looking for kids to e-mail. He says he's interested

in: "building with Legos (esp. Star Wars), learning about physics, playing basketball and

soccer, and reading. We live on farm in Vermont with cows, sheep, a horse, chickens, dogs

and cats."

Any takers, or ideas for finding interested kids?

Thanks,

Suzanne
